alg_conf:
Configuration sets for RESResonanceSelector EventRecordVisitorI
The resonances can be passed as a list of names (use resonance-name-list key), as a list of PDG codes (use resonance-pdgc-list key) or as a list of Resonance_t enumerations (use resonance-id-list key)
In this set we do not include the ambiguous P33(1600) and F17(1970). This configuration set, uses a single resonance xsec that is Breit-Wigner weighted.
genie::RSSingleRESPXSec Default
P33(1232),S11(1535),D13(1520),S11(1650),D13(1700),D15(1675),S31(1620), D33(1700),P11(1440),P13(1720),F15(1680),P31(1910),P33(1920), F35(1905),F37(1950),P11(1710)
